Title: The War Memorials

reviewText: Here gain the DVD which is very well done only gives info on Arlington Cemetary and the Vietnam war mémorial, it is very interesting and very well done but I has hoped ti have the other memorials: 2nd WW, Korean war ....
Title: The War Memorials

reviewText: I was in Washington, D.C. several years ago for a convention and had the opportunity to visit most of the war memorials.  The only one I missed was the Marine Corps one.  When you are at Arlington national Cemetary, you are walking on hallowed ground.  The ceremony of the changing of the guard by the Tomb of the Unknowns is very somber, awe-inspiring and moving.  As a nation, we owe a huge debt of gratitude that can never be repaid to these men and women who gave the ultimate sacrifice in the cause for freedom.
Title: The War Memorials

reviewText: EXCELLENT DVD I REALLY ENJOY IT. EXCELLENT HISTORY I HAVE SEEN SOME OF THESE PLACES AND I WANTED TO HAVE A DVD.
Title: The War Memorials

reviewText: I've watched this video a few times and we always show it on our bus trips to Washington, DC when we take 50 VETERANS on a three day trip there each year from Southeastern Indiana.
Title: The War Memorials
